1.task: Make your bed
Go around your house and pick up all the dishes and drinking glasses on your nightstand and coffee table.
Trim your toe nails.
Clean off your computer desktop.
Wipe off your bathroom mirror
Open all the mail and envelopes you know aren’t important
Pull in your trash, recycling, and compost bins from the curb.
Plug in your phone and charge it.
Take that pile of shoes by the front door (or under the coffee table) and put them where they belong.
Wash that plate or cereal bowl instead of putting it in the sink
Take all the receipts and papers and bags out of your car.
Back up your computer.
Wipe off the front of your refrigerator or oven
Send that one email reply you’ve been avoiding
Clean the coffee pot or toss the filter and grounds now, not later.
Floss. Your. Teeth.
Go through your text messages and make sure you’ve actually replied to the important ones, not just replied in your head
Invite your spouse or partner for some intimate time later.
Microwave a bowl of half white vinegar and half water for one minute
Clean out your browser tabs
Replenish your toilet paper reserves
Throw all your dirty clothes in the hamper or a laundry basket.
Water your plants.
Stack up books, magazines, records, DVDs, library media, etc, that you’re currently enjoying.
Switch out your bathroom towels
Take your vitamins
Look away from the computer screen
Refill your soap dispensers.
Stand up, take a walk
Put on sunscreen.
Smile. Really, really big
Fluff and straighten the pillows on your sofa
Download current episodes of your favorite podcasts
Tell somebody you love them.
Do 30 pushups.
Take all the coats and jackets off hooks and back of the door and hang them up in the closet.
Shake out door mats and bathroom rugs
Sweep underneath the toe kick on your kitchen cabinets
Wrap and coil up your cables, headphones, and power cords
Close your eyes and breathe deeply for 60 seconds.
Do 20 pushups
Drink a glass of water
Check your todo list

2.task: Slow down and catch your breath

5.task: Read a few pages of a book

7.task: Delete apps you rarely use from your smartphone
